citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1100 am on
19-Jul-17.
Inspector knocked on door with no answer, waited 30 minutes. Spoke to sister-in-law of licensee at phone booth
who said no family members were at home.

narrative:
